survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on the effectiveness and satisfaction with the current corporate wellness programs offered by the company.

questions.question_text: How often do you participate in the corporate wellness programs?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice dropdown for mobile-friendly response.

script.question_text: How often do you participate in the corporate wellness programs?

questions.question_text: Which wellness programs have you participated in? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select. Include 'None of the above' to capture non-participation.

script.question_text: Which wellness programs have you participated in? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of wellness programs offered?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for consistency in satisfaction questions.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of wellness programs offered?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the wellness programs?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture qualitative feedback. Limit response to 500 characters.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the wellness programs?

questions.question_text: Have you noticed any positive changes in your health or well-being due to the wellness programs?
questions.client_notes: Exclude non-participants based on Q1 response.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with conditional display

script.question_text: Have you noticed any positive changes in your health or well-being due to the wellness programs?

questions.question_text: How convenient are the timings of the wellness programs for your schedule?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure convenience.

script.question_text: How convenient are the timings of the wellness programs for your schedule?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend the corporate wellness programs to a colleague?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard recommendation scale for benchmarking.

script.question_text: Would you recommend the corporate wellness programs to a colleague?

questions.question_text: What barriers prevent you from participating more often in the wellness programs? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Programs not relevant to my needs
questions.client_notes: Include 'Other' with a text box for additional barriers.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox with an open-text option for 'Other'

script.question_text: What barriers prevent you from participating more often in the wellness programs? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Programs not relevant to my needs

questions.question_text: How well do the wellness programs align with your personal health goals?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to assess alignment with personal goals.

script.question_text: How well do the wellness programs align with your personal health goals?

questions.question_text: What additional wellness programs would you like to see offered?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to gather suggestions for new programs.

script.question_text: What additional wellness programs would you like to see offered?
